title: Web Scraping for required data – NZCB
snippet:
I require data extracted from a specific website: https://www.nzcb.nz
(if you click on 'I'm a Homeowner', then put a, e, i, o, or u in the 'find your builder' search tab I get about 1500 builders details approx.)

Data to be presented in a excel spreadsheet.
Data required: Full Name, Business Name, Email Address.
Optional data if easy and doesn't increase job cost: Mobile Number, Landline Number, Area (not essential)

NB:  Sending a small sample of what you can do from the website I require data from always impresses me and increases your chance of employment.  So I can check we are on the same page.

I'm looking for accuracy and best price for the above described work.

Many thanks,
Ryan
